verses.name: Numbers 26:17
verses.text: Of Arod, the family of the Arodites: of Areli, the family of the Arelites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:18
verses.text: These are the families of the children of Gad according to those that were numbered of them, forty thousand and five hundred.

verses.name: Numbers 26:19
verses.text: The sons of Judah were Er and Onan: and Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan.

verses.name: Numbers 26:20
verses.text: And the sons of Judah after their families were; of Shelah, the family of the Shelanites: of Pharez, the family of the Pharzites: of Zerah, the family of the Zarhites.
